meanings.sent1: The balloon was airborne, floating gently in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The paper airplane was airborne for a few seconds before landing on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The airborne leaves danced in the wind, creating a beautiful swirling pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were airborne, soaring high above the clouds of reality.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the flowers was airborne, spreading through the entire room.

meanings.definition: Operating or taking place in the air
meanings.sent1: The airborne birds glided effortlessly through the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent2: The drone was airborne, capturing stunning aerial footage of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's powers were airborne, allowing him to fly without any visible means of propulsion.
meanings.sent4: The idea of freedom was airborne, symbolized by the birds soaring high above.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter was airborne, echoing across the open field.

meanings.sent1: The airborne descended from the aircraft, ready to execute their mission on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The military base housed a fleet of airborne vehicles used for rapid deployment.
meanings.sent3: The airborne were well-trained soldiers, skilled in both air and ground combat.
meanings.sent4: The concept of speed was embodied by the swift movements of the airborne on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the engines signaled the arrival of the airborne reinforcements.
